text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
With hope in my heart, I entered the<n>school gates for the
very first time...<n>That was the very beginning.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: I won my debut race, taking another<n>step forward...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
My racing career has begun, and so<n>has my race towards
my dream.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
"Middle Distance Basics Volume<n>One..." "The Secret to
Racing and<n>Pacing..."

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Oh? Doing some studying, Suzuka?<n>You don't usually come
to the library.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Fukukitaru... That's right, my trainer<n>asked me to study the
different ways<n>races can unfold.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Oh yeah, our teacher mentioned that<n>your running strategy
should change<n>based on the distance and track<n>condition,
right?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Ah, in that case, do you want me togive you a reading?! I can tell you theperfect strategy for you!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Th-that's okay. I think my trainer and<n>I have it handled.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Judging by your sudden interest in<n>the library, is it safe to
assume your<n>next race has been decided?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Air Groove... Yes, my next race is the<n>Yayoi Sho. I've got
less than a month.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Well, you did debut late. If you're<n>going to take on the
Classics, your<n>schedule is going to be packed.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
But why would that worry you? You<n>finished your last race
in the lead by<n>seven lengths.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Did you watch my debut race? Thank<n>you for your support.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Huuuh?! You went to cheer on<n>Suzuka?! You should've told
me—I<n>would've come along!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: I-I was simply there to observe her!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
More importantly, you need to<n>prepare for the road ahead of
you.<n>Winning consecutive races is no easy<n>task.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: I know. That's why I'm here at the<n>library.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: What's more, I'll do whatever ittakes to see that scenery...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Huff... puff...

text_block_list.name: Suzuka's Trainer
text_block_list.text: 1,000 meters in 58.5 seconds...<n>You're still going too fast.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: ...Understood.

text_block_list.name: Suzuka's Trainer
text_block_list.text: The Yayoi Sho is 2,000 meters, so youneed to conserve your stamina for thehomestretch. Now do another lap, this time with your pace in mind.

text_block_list.name: Suzuka's Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Your talents are some of the best<n>I've ever seen. With the
proper<n>preparations, I have no doubt you'll<n>seize victory
after victory.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Yes, ma'am! I'll do my best!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
I must pay attention to the movement<n>of those around me
and determine an<n>advantageous position. The goal is to<n>
avoid any loss of momentum or<n>positioning.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
With this strategy, I'll be the first past<n>the finish line every
time. Getting there<n>first is what matters. Nothing else.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Surely... if I follow this method, I will<n>see the scenery I seek.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
She's done it! She's won by three<n>whole lengths! The
Yayoi Sho is hers!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
After a late start, Silence Suzuka<n>crosses the finish line in
eighth place!<n>She was a favorite to win, but<n>perhaps her
inexperience cost her.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
(My pace, my position, the track<n>conditions, the weather,
and every<n>move made around me...)

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: (There's so much I have to keep in<n>mind while racing.)

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Just... one more lap!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
(The sound of my cleats hitting the<n>ground... a pleasant
breeze through<n>my hair... and no one in my path.)

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
(My head feels so clear here. If I<n>could, I would run like this
forever.)

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Huff... Huff...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: (But... this running style won't get me<n>to the scenery I—)

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: AN UMAMUSUME!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Eep! Wh-what?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Woooow! A real-life Umamusume!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: U-um... Aren't you an Umamusume as<n>well?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Well, yeah, but outside of looking in a<n>mirror, you're the first
one I've ever<n>seen!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Oh! And, and! You look so glamorouswhen you're runn'n! Like, sooopretty!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ah! I-I-I'm sorry! I was staring,<n>wasn't I?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Anyway, I just transferred to Tracen<n>Academy today! The
name's Special<n>Week!
